Package org.kiji.rest.serializers

Contains custom object to JSON serializers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AvroToJsonStringSerializer Avro's specific types don't seem to serialize properly so this class provides the necessary hook to convert an Avro SpecificRecordBase to a Json string literal meant to be embedded in another JSON object sent back to the client.
JsonToKijiRestEntityId Converts a JSON object to a SchemaOption.
JsonToSchemaOption Converts a JSON object to a SchemaOption.
KijiRestEntityIdToJson Converts the SchemaOption to JSON.
SchemaOptionToJson Converts the SchemaOption to JSON.
TableLayoutToJsonSerializer Ensures that the TableLayoutDesc avro class can be written to the client as a proper JSON string.
Utf8ToJsonSerializer Avro's specific types don't seem to serialize properly so this class provides the necessary hook to convert an Avro SpecificRecordBase to a Json object that can properly be serialized and sent back to the client.
 

Package org.kiji.rest.serializers Description

Contains custom object to JSON serializers. Mostly used for ensuring Avro types are serialized to JSON properly.
